data.title: Lonny Chapman Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Lonny Chapman on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Lonny Chapman including The Hunted, Where the Red Fern Grows, and more.
data.text:
Dead Heat

Jessica has the difficult task of proving that her niece was framed for the murder of the horse's owner.

Indian Giver

The descendant (Bernie White) of an American Indian tribe that once lived in the Cabot Cove area brandishes a land grant that seems to prove his claim to the territory. Theodore Bikel, Gary Lockwood and Charles Siebert also guest star.

The Case of the Tandem Target

A young man is accused of murdering the domineering stepfather of the woman he hopes to marry.

Dead Eye

While attending a writers' conference in Florida, Jessica stumbles onto old photos that may be linked to the JFK assassination.
